page.title: 15SPENDLOVE CENTRE,CHARLBURY
page.content: When the Spendlove Secondary School closed down in 1982 it was left empty for two years.Two business men then decided to turn it into a Centre for community use,offering units for local businesses,employment and facilities which were lacking in Charlbury. Now,after seven months there is a computer firm,a dentist,a veterinary surgeon,a scientific instrument firm and the poetess,Pam Ayres has her Manager based in the building.Miss Ayres officially opened the Centre in November 1984. The hall is used for Dinners and Dances with a Live Band.The Badminton Club rents the hall three nights a week. The Spendlove Centre is proving to be a great asset in this predominantly rural area.
